alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hardeman, southern Haywood and southwestern Madison Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brownsville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Brownsville, Chickasaw State Forest, Bemis, Hillville, Dancyville, Cloverport, Mercer, Stanton, Medon, Asbury, Neely, Allens, Huntersville, Hickory Point, Westover, Uptonville, Shepp, Teague and Leighton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
